FORMULA_TEXT:
/*************************************************************************** 
FORMULA NAME: AXE_HCM_WORKPLACE_SEGMENT_CHECKLIST_ELIGIBILITY_FF
FORMULA TYPE: Participation and Rate Eligibility Formula 
DESCRIPTION: This formula returns a 'Y' if the employee if new workplace segment is  'Hybrid' or 'Virtual'
Change History: 
Name Date Comments 
*******************************************************************************/

DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 IS ' ' 

ELIGIBLE = 'N' 

IF (PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 = 'Hybrid')

THEN(ELIGIBLE = 'Y') 

ELSE IF (PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 = 'Virtual') 

THEN (ELIGIBLE = 'Y') 

RETURN ELIGIBLE

/***************************************************************************

DESCRIPTION: This formula returns a 'Y' if the employee if new workplace segment is  'Hybrid' or 'Virtual'
Change History: 
Name Date Comments 
*******************************************************************************/

DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 IS ' ' 

ELIGIBLE = 'N' 

IF (PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 = 'Hybrid')

THEN(ELIGIBLE = 'Y') 

ELSE IF (PER_ASG_ATTRIBUTE11 = 'Virtual') 

THEN (ELIGIBLE = 'Y') 

RETURN ELIGIBLE
